meanings.definition: Engaged in a physical struggle or conflict.
meanings.sent1: The two boys were fighting over a toy.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers were in a fighting mood before the battle.
meanings.sent3: The kittens were playfully fighting over a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds were fighting against the sun's rays.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's fighting spirit never wavered.

meanings.definition: Striving to overcome or resist something.
meanings.sent1: She had a fighting attitude when facing challenges.
meanings.sent2: The team showed a fighting spirit in the final minutes of the game.
meanings.sent3: The little seedling was fighting against the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a warrior fighting against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The student had a fighting mindset to pass the exam.

meanings.definition: Showing a readiness or inclination to fight.
meanings.sent1: The guard dog had a fighting stance when strangers approached.
meanings.sent2: The wild animals displayed fighting behavior when threatened.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were always fighting playfully over silly things.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds were fighting to cover the bright sky.
meanings.sent5: The warrior princess had a fighting look in her eyes.
